text: Indra Mustafa (born 26 June 1999 in Bogor) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Liga 3 club Bandung United, on loan from Persib Bandung. ==Career== ===Persib Bandung=== He was signed for Persib Bandung to played in Liga 1 on 2018 season. ==References== ==External links== * Indra Mustafa at Liga Indonesia * Indra Mustafa at Soccerway Category:Living people Category:1999 births Category:People from Bogor Category:Sportspeople from West Java Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Persib Bandung players Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:Indonesia youth international footballers
title: Indra Mustafa
